=============================
External member documentation
=============================

Purpose
=======
This external member is dedicated to be used by everyone with a xPL client (DIY or commercial product). It allows to use some generic features (temperature, teleinfo, ...) without needing to create a dedicated external member for the xPL client.


Thermometer
===========

Features
--------

* temperature

xPL message
-----------

The thermometer feature is related to the __sensor.basic__ message: ::

* xpl-stat or xpl-trig: ::

    sensor.basic
    {
    type=temp
    device=<device address>
    current=<value>
    }

Teleinfo
========

Features
--------

* Max power
* Instant power
* Off peak hours
* Peak hours
* Tariff period
* Apparent power
* Hourly group
* Instant power 1
* Instant power 2
* Instant power 3
* Max power 1
* Max power 2
* Max power 3
